# Welcome to ESL RAG Backend Docs

This documentation provides an overview of the ESL RAG Backend, including system architecture, API reference, and operational guides.

## Sections

*   **[Architecture](architecture.md)**: High-level design and production scaling strategies.
*   **[API Reference](api_reference.md)**: Auto-generated documentation for the API endpoints and internal modules.
*   **[RAG Concepts](rag_concepts.md)**: Background information on Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and the specific techniques used here (Hybrid Ingestion, Atoms).
*   **[User Manual](user_manual.md)**: Guide for operators managing the system.
